H0.text: What sign of the zodiac is represented by a lion. Aries

H1.text: What sign of the zodiac is represented by a lion. Sagittarius

H2.text: What sign of the zodiac is represented by a lion. Cancer

H3.text: What sign of the zodiac is represented by a lion. Leo

A4.text: Leo is the fifth sign of the zodiac.

A5.text: The constellation Leo is associated with the mythological Nemean lion.
